amendment.description: Amendment sought to terminate funding for the Emerging Markets Program (EMP) after September 30, 2013.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 18 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to terminate funding for the Emerging Markets Program (EMP) after September 30, 2013.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brooks (AL) amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 103 - 322 (Roll no. 264).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Brooks (AL) amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 103 - 322 (Roll no. 264).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Brooks (AL).
